ARABIC: وَإِذْ قَالَ إِبْرَٰهِيمُ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦٓ إِنَّنِى بَرَآءٌ مِّمَّا تَعْبُدُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When Ibrahim said to his father and his people, 'I am free of everything you worship,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When Abraham said to his father and his people: "I am rid of what you worship
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Call to mind when Abraham said to his father and his people: “I totally disown all whom you serve
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When Abraham said to his father and his people, "I boldly renounce what you worship
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And when Ibrahim said to his father and his people, “I have no relation whatsoever with your deities.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And (remember) when Ibrahim said to his father and his people: "Verily, I am innocent of what you worship,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And when Ibrahim said to his father and his people: Surely I am clear of what you worship,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And when Abraham said to his father and his people, 'Surely I am quit of that you serve,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And when Abraham said unto his father and his folk: Lo! I am innocent of what ye worship
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Call to mind when Abraham said to his father and his people, "I disown utterly that which you worship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And recall what time Ibrahim said Unto his father and his people: verily I am quit of that which ye worship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: When Abraham said to his father and his people, ‘I repudiate what you worship,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Behold! Abraham said to his father and his people: "I do indeed clear myself of what ye worship:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And (remember) when Ibrahim (Abraham) said to his father and his people: "Verily, I am innocent of what you worship,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: (Remember) when Abraham, said to his father and his nation: 'I am quit from what you worship,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: When Abraham said to his father and his people, “I am innocent of what you worship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [mention, O Muhammad], when Abraham said to his father and his people, "Indeed, I am disassociated from that which you worship
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [43:26] And, mention, when Abraham said to his father and his people, ‘Surely I am innocent of that which you   worship,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And when Abraham said unto his father) Azar (and his folk) when He was sent to them: (Lo! I am innocent of what ye worship
